query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_routes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN name LIKE '%→%' OR name LIKE '%->%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as routes_with_arrow,
  SUM(CASE WHEN name NOT LIKE '%→%' AND name NOT LIKE '%->%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as routes_without_arrow
FROM trip_routes;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_routes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN name LIKE '%→%' OR name LIKE '%->%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as routes_with_arrow,
  SUM(CASE WHEN name NOT LIKE '%→%' AND name NOT LIKE '%->%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as routes_without_arrow
FROM trip_routes;
